title: (x) Apple Dish cleaner / connected brush script - (similar to) Rage Italic {Jonathan G}
content:
This is used on a cleaning label and we've only ever had it as paths. Can someone put me out of my misery and ID it?

Regards  
Jason
author: byngo

comments.content:
Possibly a modified Rage Italic with a custom A ?

[http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/rage-italic/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140625101259/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/rage-italic/ "http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/rage-italic/")
